name: Tomb of the Dark Times
description:
Controls:
WASD to move
Space for narrative
R to restart the level

Gameplay:
You control Canda, the infamous mercenary, trying to escape the tomb after stealing the powers of time.

Enemies:
Magician: Shoot fireball that travel once every turn.
Spike: Spike up every standard turn.
Slimy: Shoot laser that travel 4 range.
Skeley: patrol back and forth while attack NSEW after moving.

 Credits:
Ancient Ruins BGM - Ted Kerr 2017
Ruins Of Empire BGM - Tausdei
Main Character - sylvius fischer
